name: Wood Elf
description: As a wood elf, you have keen senses and intuition, and your fleet feet carry you quickly and stealthily through your native forests.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

features.name: Elf Weapon Training
features.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

features.name: Mask of the Wild
features.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

features.name: Elven Lineage
features.description: You know the Druidcraft cantrip. At 3rd level you can cast Longstrider once per long rest. At 5th level you can cast Pass without Trace once per long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

spells.name: Druidcraft
spells.description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of several minor effects: predict weather, make a flower blossom or a seed pod open, create a harmless sensory effect, or instantly light or snuff out a candle, torch, or small campfire.
